text: The Immortal Garrison () is a 1956 Soviet war movie directed by Zakhar Agranenko and Eduard Tisse.Советские и российские лауреаты Венецианского кинофестиваляБЕССМЕРТНЫЙ ГАРНИЗОН It stars Vasili Makarov, Vladimir Yemelyanov, and Nikolai Kryuchkov. == Actors == *Vasili Makarov as Baturin *Vladimir Yemelyanov as Kondratiev *Nikolai Kryuchkov as Kukharkov *Anatoli Chemodurov as Rudenko *Valentina Serova as Maria Nikolayevna *Lidiya Sukharevskaya as Aleksandra Petrovna == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1956 war movies Category:Soviet war movies Category:Movies directed by Zakhar Agranenko
title: The Immortal Garrison
